hero.description: Professional touchless car wash with eco-friendly products. Get your car sparkling clean in minutes with our advanced technology.

express.title: Express
express.target: Employees looking for quick wash during work.
express.services: Complete exterior wash, interior and trunk vacuum, window cleaning.
express.advantages: Time saving, water economy (waterless technology), on-site service.

confort.title: Comfort
confort.services: Express services + bug removal, rim degreasing.
confort.advantages: More durable finish (light dashboard polishing and body protector).

prestige.title: Prestige
prestige.target: Executives and business leaders seeking premium home/office service.
prestige.services: Complete + bug removal, polish, body protection, plastic renovation, seat/carpet stain removal, tire treatment, window/rim cleaning, anti-rain windshield, detailed vacuum.
prestige.advantages: Fixed price prestige, more practical than workshop detailing.

vip.title: VIP Detailing
vip.target: Business owners or luxury vehicle owners.
vip.services: Prestige + professional polishing/waxing, ceramic treatment, leather conditioning, disinfection, anti-rain windshield, extended interior protection.
vip.advantages: Complete waterless detailing, ideal for annual maintenance or resale.

footer.description: Premium car wash services with eco-friendly products and cutting-edge technology.
